contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|epiphany}} {{TOCright}} '''Epiphany''' may refer to: ==Religion and social sciences== * [[Epiphany (religion)]], the appearance of a deity to a human, known as theophany ** [[Epiphany (holiday)]], a Christian holiday on January 6 marking the theophany of the infant Jesus to the Magi ** [[Second Coming of Christ]], the anticipated theophany (epiphany) of Jesus as a return to Earth * [[Hierophany]], an epiphany or manifestation of the sacred more broadly defined than a theophany * [[Darśana]], Hindu term commonly used for "visions of the divine" * [[Epiphany (feeling)]], a sudden realization of great truth ==Business and technology== * [[Epiphany, Inc.]], a software development company * [[Web (web browser)]] for the GNOME graphical computing desktop was previously known as ''Epiphany'' * a many-core processor from [[Adapteva]] ==Television and film== * [[Epiphany (Angel)|"Epiphany" (''Angel'')]], a 2001 episode of ''Angel'' * "Epiphany", a character played by Lisa Bonet in the film ''[[Angel Heart]]'' * [[Epiphanies (Babylon 5)|"Epiphanies" (''Babylon 5'')]], a 1997 episode of ''Babylon 5'' * [[Epiphanies (Battlestar Galactica)|"Epiphanies" (''Battlestar Galactica'')]], a 2006 episode of ''Battlestar Galactica'' * "The Feast of Epiphany", a 2008 episode of ''[[Brothers & Sisters (2006 TV series)|Brothers & Sisters]]'' * [[Epiphany (Desperate Housewives)|"Epiphany" (''Desperate Housewives'')]], a 2010 episode of ''Desperate Housewives'' * [[Epiphany Johnson]], a fictional character on the American soap opera ''General Hospital'' * [[Epiphanies (Spaced)|"Epiphanies" (''Spaced'')]], a 1999 episode of ''Spaced'' * [[Epiphany (Stargate Atlantis)|"Epiphany" (''Stargate Atlantis'')]], a 2005 episode of ''Stargate Atlantis'' * "Epiphany", a 1989 episode of ''[[List of War of the Worlds episodes|War of the Worlds]]'' ==Music== * ''[[Epiphany: The Best of Chaka Khan, Vol. 1]]'', 1996 compilation album by Chaka Khan * [[Epiphany (T-Pain album)|''Epiphany'' (T-Pain album)]], released in 2007 by T-Pain * [[Epiphany (Ian Villafana album)|''Epiphany'' (Ian Villafana album)]], 2010 album * [[Epiphany (Manafest album)|''Epiphany'' (Manafest album)]], 2005 album by Manafest * [[Epiphany (Chrisette Michele album)]], a 2009 album by R&B singer Chrisette Michele * [[Epiphany (Chrisette Michele song)]], the lead single from the album of the same name * [[Epifanie (Berio)|''Epifanie'' (Berio)]], a musical composition by the Italian composer Luciano Berio * "Epiphany", a song by Bad Religion from their 2002 album ''[[The Process of Belief]]'' * "Epiphany", a song by Staind from their 2001 album ''[[Break the Cycle]]'' * "Epiphany", a song by Bowling For Soup from their 2006 album ''[[The Great Burrito Extortion Case]]'' * "Epiphany", a song from the 2007 album [[Heliocentric (The Ocean Collective album)|''Heliocentric'' (The Ocean Collective album)]] * "Epiphany", a song from the 2010 album [[Deceiver (The Word Alive album)|''Deceiver'' (The Word Alive album)]] * "Epiphany", a song in Stephen Sondheim's Gothic melodrama musical, ''[[Sweeney Todd, the Demon Barber of Fleet Street]]'' * "Epiphany", a song on the [[Crank: High Voltage (soundtrack)|''Crank: High Voltage'' (soundtrack)]] * "Epiphany from The Abyss", a Technical Blackened Deathcore band from Québec ==Art== * [[The Epiphany (Bosch)|''The Epiphany'' (Bosch)]], a triptych and earlier panel painting ''Epiphany'' by Hieronymus Bosch * [[Epiphany (painting)|''Epiphany'' (painting)]], by Dutch painter [[Gerbrand van den Eeckhout]] * ''[[Epifania]]'', a drawing by Michelangelo ==Literature== *[[Epiphany (novel)|''Epiphany'' (novel)]], a 1997 novel by David Hewson *[http://www.poemhunter.com/poem/epiphany-58/ ''Epiphany''], a lyrical poem by [[Dr Tapan Kumar Pradhan]] * "Epiphany", a 1999 short story by [[Connie Willis]] *''Epiphany'', a literary journal ==See also== {{commons|Epiphany}} * [[Devorah Frost|Epiphany]], the professional wrestler, Devorah Frost * [[Epiphanny Prince]], a basketball player * [[Epiphanes (disambiguation)]] * [[Epiphone]], a guitar manufacturer owned by the [[Gibson Guitar Corporation]] * [[John of Epiphania]], sixth century Byzantine historian. * [[Tiffany (given name)]] {{disambig}}
